Articles.Content: Heard rumours that the game is due for release soon, that is fantastic news! Do we have an exact date? Great to hear everything is nearly finished after all this time. Cant wait to play it as intended. How many planets and moons are there in the game now then?
Prices for controlled substances must be plummeting on the island.
Calm down dear, you'll give us Brits a bad name.
I believe "Soon" is the default release date for all things KSP.

I believe "Soon" is the default release date for all things KSP.

http://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles?topics=development
What is that link supposed to show? There's no mention of Squad or KSP there.

Rumour and wild speculation are not far from conspiracy theories. In addition, asking for release dates is explicitly forbidden. KSP is presently at version 0.23.5. The next release is expected to be 0.24. A finished version (i.e., 1.0) is not expected for some time yet. Please refrain from putting rumour forth as if it were indisputable fact.

This thread really can't be imagined to be going anywhere useful or pleasant, so I think I'll close it for now.
